segments.text: We have various transportation services . Would you prefer a private vehicle ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , thanks . A taxi is just fine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I suggest a limo ? It's nice to pamper yourself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't want anything except a taxi , thank you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I understand . And where will you be going ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And what time would you like to be picked up ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A taxi will be here shortly , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! And remember , a taxi , not a limo .
segments.speaker: S1
